content_chunks.title: About Me
content_chunks.content: Elijah Taguinod Alonzo is an IT enthusiast currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology at St. Paul University Philippines. Passionate about technology and interested in specializing in Cloud Computing, Cyber Security, Data Analytics, Project Management, and Web Development.

content_chunks.title: Technical Skills
content_chunks.content: Programming Languages: PHP, Python, JavaScript, Java. Frameworks: Laravel, React, Next.js, Django. Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MariaDB, MongoDB. Web Development: Frontend & Backend Development, REST API Development, Responsive UI/UX. Graphic Editing: Photo Retouching, Color Correction, Layout & Composition. Video Editing: Cutting & Sequencing, Color Grading, Audio Cleanup, Motion Graphics. Tools: Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Premiere, Canva. Additional Skills: Database Design & Optimization, Server & Deployment (Apache, Nginx), API Integration, Linux Basics, Cybersecurity Practices, Project Management (Agile, SCRUM).

content_chunks.title: Education
content_chunks.content: Bachelor of Information Technology at St. Paul University Philippines, currently pursuing.

content_chunks.title: Hard Skills Experience
content_chunks.content: Project Lead and Developer for Paulinian Student Government E-Portfolio and Ranking System. IT Department Leader and Developer during Collaborative Online International Learning (COIL) Program. 3rd Place in 2023 SPUP–PATHWAY Hackathon.

content_chunks.title: Soft Skills Experience
content_chunks.content: Senator at Paulinian Student Government (2022–2023). Assistant P.R.O. at Paulinian Student Government (2023–2024). Secretary at Paulinian Student Government (2023–2024). 3rd Year Representative at Junior Philippine Computer Society (2023–2024). Member of Multimedia Committee, Rotaract Club of Tuguegarao (2023–2024).

content_chunks.title: Training & Seminars
content_chunks.content: TCON 2023 – The Ultimate Tech Event in the North. SPUP CyberSummit 2023. SPUP CyberSummit 2024. SPUP CyberSummit 2025. SPUP CyberSecurity RoadShow 2025.

content_chunks.title: Projects Portfolio
content_chunks.content: Digital Twin: An AI-powered digital twin chatbot using RAG technology to provide information about background, skills, and experiences. Equal Learn: An educational video hosting website designed for kids and teachers. Paulinian Student Government E-Portfolio and Ranking System: A comprehensive system for managing student portfolios and rankings. Gem Catcher: A 2D arcade-style game where players catch gems.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals
content_chunks.content: Interested in specializing in Cloud Computing, Cyber Security, Data Analytics, Project Management, and Web Development.
